name: Grail Racers
description:
Speed

This is a game about exceeding and conquering speed.

From the creators of Call of Duty, God of War, Lord of the Rings and Medal of Honor, will come another great game in the near future, but this game is not one such game! 

Grail Racers makes sharp distinction between two racers, shining their rivalry through two immensely engaging levels. The Blue Car, Decky, runs away mercilessly, indulged in his pride. All we need to do is overthrow his egotism and achieve the accomplishment that lies at the end.

May Decky be taught the lesson he deserves to learn.
